room.Description: You are in the entrance Area of the Building. A double door is leading outside. There is a monitor displaying "Physic Institute GSTER" No one is around. Another door is behind the entrance desk with the label "security" on it. In the middle of the room there is also an desk.

Interactions.response: A normal Desk.A PC is on it.
I need a password to log in..

you log into the PC and check the files. Some files are for deliveries made to this Institute. Old stuff from all over the world got deliverd here. You check the list of professors from this university and find your own face in it. It seems you have worked here. But why dont you have any memory of it?

PassInteraction.response: you walk outside into the Hallway.

Interactions.response: big stable door with the sign of the institute on it.

PassInteraction.response: You open the door to your freedom.

Door.NoKeyResponse: the door is locked... you didnt think it would be so easy right? ;)

Interactions.response: a door with the sign "security" on it.

PassInteraction.response: You open the door to the security room.
